channel.title: Virtual Hosting on Wimpy's World
channel.description: Recent content in Virtual Hosting on Wimpy's World

item.title: Conslidated RavenCore HOW-TOs
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description: I have reorganized and consolidated my Debian and Ubuntu HOW-TOs for RavenCore 0.2.3.

item.title: RavenCore 0.2.3 on Debian and Ubuntu
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description: I have updated my HOW-TO for installing RavenCore on Debian (at the request of the RavenCore developer) and added a HOW-TO for installing RavenCore on Ubuntu. The are still some minor compatibility issues with Debian and Ubuntu and these HOW-TOs have been sent to the RavenCore developer to help document the outstanding incompatibilities.
item.summary: Updated Debian & Ubuntu documentation for RavenCore

item.title: RavenCore 0.1.5 on Debian
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description: I have updated my HOW-TO for installing RavenCore 0.1.5 on Debian. I’m pleased to report that the RavenCore developer has been very responsive to my feedback and has significantly improved “out of the box” Debian compatibility in this release. The are still some minor compatibility issues and I’ve’ sent feedback to the developer in the hope that things will continue to improve with RavenCore 0.1.6.
item.summary: New RavenCore. New documentation for Debian users

item.title: I am a winner!
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description: Yah for me! I have won the RavenCore documentation contest.

item.title: RavenCore 0.1.4 on Debian
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description:
I set up my new server to use RavenCore so that managing my domains and e-mail accounts for friends and family will be as easy as possible. RavenCore is designed for use on CentOS primarily and therefore RavenCore 0.1.4 requires some tweaking in order to get it fully working and compatible with Debian.

I have been sharing my feedback with the RavenCore author and when RavenCore 0.1.5 is released “out of the box” Debian compatibility should be a reality.
item.summary: Managing virtual hosting on Debian with RavenCore

item.title: RavenCore 0.0.6 on Debian
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description:
I have been testing a few virtual hosting control panels the last couple of days and I am deeply impressed with RavenCore, so much so I will most likely use it for a project I am planning. However, Debian is my server distro of choice and RavenCore needs a little tweaking in order to work seamlessly with Debian. I have been keeping some notes that explain how to get RavenCore to play nicely with Debian.

I have submitted my notes in the RavenCore Forums and agreed to assist the author with any future testing to work toward better “out of the box” Debian integration.
item.summary: Virtual hosting on Debian with RavenCore
